Pre-Game Insights: The Cincinnati Reds are calling up Rhett Lowder to pitch on Friday night against the Milwaukee Brewers.
Lowder is expected to start either the 12:40pm or 6:40pm game in a day/night doubleheader.
Lowder has shown inconsistent performance this season, with a dominant run in late July and early August.
He made his debut for Louisville and threw six shutout innings, allowing just three hits, walking no one, and striking out seven.
